Replace.Text: Unique to the Hermetic Order, replaces the University. This Campus district generates [ICON_Gold] Gold equal to its [ICON_Science] Science adjacency bonus. {LOC_BUILDING_UNIVERSITY_DESCRIPTION_SST}{LOC_BUILDING_UNIVERSITY_DESCRIPTION_SST}

Unique to the Owls of Minerva, replaces the Bank. This Commercial Hub generates [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to its [ICON_Gold] Gold adjacency bonus. Having a Harbor in this city provides you with +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity. {LOC_BUILDING_BANK_DESCRIPTION_SST}
Unlocked by discovering a Natural Wonder. Reveals the Ley Line resource on the map. Ley Lines give a major adjacency bonus to all specialty districts and provide high yields.
Unlocked in Medieval Era. Cities earn [ICON_Gold] Gold per turn equal to 20% of their [ICON_Faith] Faith per turn rate, as well as 10% of their [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture.
黄金黎明协会专属，替代大学。此学院提供等同于其 [ICON_Science] 科技值相邻加成的 [ICON_Gold] 金币。{LOC_BUILDING_UNIVERSITY_DESCRIPTION_SST}
弥涅耳瓦夜鹰专属，替代银行。此商业中心提供等同于其 [ICON_Gold] 金币相邻加成的 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。若此城市中拥有港口，则+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。{LOC_BUILDING_BANK_DESCRIPTION_SST}
发现自然奇观后解锁。在地图上显示“地脉”资源。地脉能为所有特色区域带来大量相邻加成并提供大量产出。
中古时代解锁。城市每回合获得等同于其每回合所获 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值20%的 [ICON_Gold] 金币，以及10%的 [ICON_Science] 科技值和 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。
